page.title: 18Leisure and Recreation 2
page.content: {THE TENNIS CLUB}Mrs.D.Johnstone is the Treasurer of the Tennis Club. She plays doubles in tennis and has won two shields. In the Winter she plays in the morning but in the Summer she plays about 4 times a week in the evening. The courts were built in 1941 and were grass. In 1970 they were tarmacked. One court was renewed this year at a cost of Â£2500. {THE KINGS HEAD}Mr.& Mrs.Hughes run the Kings Head. There are between 15 and 20 people in the Darts Team. They have about 26 matches in a year, they meet on Wednesdays and Fridays. People who play have light refreshments, then when they have had their game they have stronger drinks.The pub has Pool, Darts and Shovehalfpenny. {THE FORESTERS ARMS}This popular public house is run by Mr.& Mrs.Dingwall. There is a lively darts team here.
